name: Bioware Creature File
summary: Learn about .UTC files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: Creature files are used by various video games including Neverwinter Nights, Star Wars: Knights of the Old Republic, and other programs.

description: Creature created using Bioware's Aurora 3D rendering engine; can interact with objects and other creatures; may be controlled by artificial intelligence or a human player.
